timeline.message:
Update/add Third Party library licensing info and removed jaxb-api which is not used any more.

Signed-off-by: Ljupcho Palashevski <ljupcho.palashevski@ing.com>

Revert removal of jaxb-api, used in org.odpi.egeria:gaian-ranger-plugin as transitive dependency

Signed-off-by: Ljupcho Palashevski <ljupcho.palashevski@ing.com>

timeline.bodyText: is it still needed here? I only saw it used in the gain ranger plugin as a transitive dependency, so it would need to be in dependencyManagement but not anywhere else?
timeline.author: planetf1

replies.bodyText: Actually I remember now, this was the original place where I wanted to remove it because it looks like leftover from previous usage but then got too optimistic =). Should be good now only present in the master pom dependencies management.
replies.author: lpalashevski

timeline.message:
Not needed under u-chassis-spring

Signed-off-by: Ljupcho Palashevski <ljupcho.palashevski@ing.com>
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:odpi/egeria into thirdpary-libraries
